page.title: 05RECREATION IN DRUIDS HEATH
page.content: The main areas of {recreation} are located at WalkerÂ£s Heath Park,BellÂ£s Farm and Manningford Hall{ Community Centres,} The British Legion and The Dell.WalkerÂ£s Heath park with facilities for most {sports} has Chinnbrook along the eastern edge and a keep fit trim track.It has a picnic area and a nine hole pitch and put golf course.There are tennis,bask- etball and netball courts,football, rugby and cricket pitches, several sqaush courts and throwing and jumping areas for athletics.BellÂ£s Farm and Manningford Hall Community Centres on BellÂ£s Lane cater for all ages.Between them they have a Mother and ToddlersÂ£ Club,Youth {clubs} for boys and girls from 8-17 years and for older members there are clubs for darts, bingo, the unemployed and the over 60Â£s. By R.Holloway and L.Poole,Bells Farm J/I
